title: Experienced Social Media Manager
job_overview:
We’re Hiring: Social Media Manager / Virtual Assistant (Remote)

Are you a detail-oriented, driven individual with a passion for digital marketing and social media? We're looking for a dedicated Social Media Virtual Assistant to join our team and grow with us long-term.

???? What We’re Looking For:
? Committed & Reliable
You show up consistently, meet deadlines, and take pride in your work.

? Excellent English Skills
Clear communication is key—both spoken and written.

? Project Management Experience
Familiar with tools like Google Sheets, Google Docs, Metricool, and Canva.

? Organized & Deadline-Focused
You know how to prioritize and multitask without losing sight of the big picture.

? Creative & Strategic Thinker
You understand analytics, spot trends, and create data-driven campaigns that get results.

? Marketing Tool Proficiency
Experience with Meta Ads, Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Pinterest, LinkedIn? Even better!

? Tech-Savvy with Strong Equipment
Fast internet, a reliable computer, a good camera, and clear audio are must-haves.

? Adaptable & Proactive
You’re a problem-solver who isn’t afraid to ask for help when needed—and never ghosts.

???? Key Responsibilities:
???? Social Media Strategy & Engagement

Launch and manage data-driven campaigns.
Monitor trends and tweak strategies for engagement.
Target niche audiences with precision.
Engage with followers to build trust and grow community.
???? Video Editing & Content Creation

Use Canva or similar tools to create short, polished video clips.
Add transitions, music, effects, and captions to tell compelling visual stories.
Collaborate with video editors to ensure brand consistency.
???? Analytics & Insights

Monitor social performance using Google Analytics, Metricool, and more.
Assist in ad management (Meta Ads, TikTok, Pinterest, etc.)
Track content performance and report key metrics.
???? Communication Tools

Use WhatsApp to stay in sync with the team and streamline communication.
???? Why Work With Us?
???? Permanent, long-term position with room to grow
????? 1 week of paid vacation
???? 13th-month pay
???? Performance bonuses
???? A supportive and invested team culture
???? We want you to thrive—and we’ll help you do it

? How to Apply:
Send your application to Upgrade to see actual info with your answers (written or audio-recorded) to the following questions:

Describe a time you used your communication skills to explain something complex. How did you make sure your message was understood?
Share an example of an important goal you set and how you reached it.
How do you manage multiple tasks and deadlines at the same time?
Give an example of a difficult decision you had to make and how you handled it.
What is your favorite place to visit, and where would you travel if given the chance?
Describe your past experience with wire services (if any).
Share a link to your OnlineJobs.ph profile.
Tell us about yourself and your family in 5 sentences.
???? Please note: All candidates will complete a short trial task before moving forward in the selection process.

We’re excited to hear from you and build something great—together.
